Change Anchor

Allows you to switch between anchoring options. The Change Anchor icon is only visible when an object such as a graphic or control field or frame is selected.

Further information about the anchoring is contained in the Anchoring Help section.

Change Anchor

Open Form Design toolbar, click

Change Anchor
